msg.msgText: Recovery has found inconsistencies in the persistent data store and recovered however {0} items have been discarded

msgExplanation.p: Some data could not be read from the persistent data store however recovery was configured to continue anyway and completed.

msgUserResponse.p: If the cause of the inconsistent data is not understood then it may be appropriate to contact IBM Support for assistance. If it is preferable that in the case of inconsistencies, the server does not start (to allow further investigation) then change the Server.TolerateRecoveryInconsistencies to false
